data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I just uploaded Win32-Wallpaper with the notice that it will become
    obsolete with the release of my Win32-Desktop module. I just want to
    register the name of the module, Win32-Desktop, so no one else takes
    it. The module should be released within the next 6 months, unless
    something unforeseen occurs.
